title: Implementation of the Development Projects utilizing the General Treasury Funds allocated by the National Budget to the Ministry of Megapolis & Western Development under the 'Haritha Udyana' Budget Line
decision_details: - The Cabinet has granted approval previously to implement the development projects by utilizing the provisions set apart under the 'Haritha Udyana'  budget line. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Megapolis & Western Development, to award the new projects of Puttalam and Balangoda and the balance scope of work of 19 projects namely the supply and installation of children's play equipment and gymnasium equipment, landscaping to the Central Engineering Services Limited. within the existing budgetary limits, was approved by the Cabinet.
